     5  
     6  package parl
     7  
     8  import "context"
     9  
    10  const (
    11  	// LogObject context key for log object in valuecontext.go
    12  	LogObject = "parl.Log"
    13  )
    14  
    15  // GetLogFromContext obtains a log possibly from context
    16  func GetLogFromContext(ctx context.Context) (log *LogInstance) {
    17  	log = ctx.Value(LogObject).(*LogInstance)
    18  	if log == nil {
    19  		log = NewLog()
    20  	}
    21  	return
    22  }
    23  
    24  // GetLogAndContext gets a context and a log
    25  func GetLogAndContext(debug bool, verbose bool, silent bool) (ctx context.Context, log *LogInstance) {
    26  	ct1 := NewContext()
    27  	log = NewLog()
    28  	if debug && !silent {
    29  		log.SetDebug(true)
    30  	}
    31  	/*
    32  		TODO
    33  		 else if verbose {
    34  			log.SetVerbose()
    35  		}
    36  	*/
    37  	StoreInContext(ct1, LogObject, log)
    38  	ctx = ct1
    39  	return
    40  }
    41
